shipremote.communication
Interface INetworkClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
TCPClient
public interface INetworkClient

An interface that provides methods for a Network client such as a TCP or UDP client.

Author:
Andreas Günther

Method Summary

          Adds a IDataReceiverListener.

          Stops listening for data.
 

Method Detail

isConnected

boolean isConnected()
Gets the connection state of the TCPClient.

Returns:
True if TCPClient is connected, else false.

Gets the Connection Timeout.

Returns:
The timeout value in milliseconds.

setConnectionTimeout

void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
Sets the connection timeout.

Parameters:
connectionTimeout - The timeout value in milliseconds.

             int port)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
Connects the client to a host.

Parameters:

port - The port the host is listening.

sendData

boolean sendData(ShipData shipCommand)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Sends data to the host.

Parameters:
shipCommand - A ShipData containing the data to send.
Returns:
true if the data was send successfully, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

readData

byte[] readData()
                throws java.io.IOException
Reads data from the host, if available.

Returns:
A byte array with the received data. If no data was received returns null.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
